data.actual_result: Discord attempts to upload the image despite not having perms and your message gets lost
data.short_description: Pasting an image in a channel you can't upload files, and then sending a message will fail to send the message
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you can't upload files - Copy an image from your phone or the web - Paste the image in that channel, making sure it doesn't show up - Type some text so the send button highlights, and send the message - Observe your screen after sending the message
